scripts.build:schema: jlpm run build:processing && node ./cacheGeoJSONSchema.js && jlpm build:schema:registry && jlpm build:schema:js && jlpm build:schema:py
scripts.build:schema:registry: echo 'Generating combined schema file for schema registry...' && cd src/schema && node ../../scripts/dereference-and-combine-schemas-for-registry.js
scripts.build:schema:js: echo 'Generating TypeScript types from schema...' && json2ts -i src/schema -o src/_interface --no-unknownAny --unreachableDefinitions --cwd ./src/schema && node ./scripts/add-schema-version.js && cp -R ./src/_interface/* ./lib/_interface/.
scripts.build:schema:py: echo 'Generating Python types from schema...' && node scripts/preprocess-schemas-for-python-type-generation.js && datamodel-codegen --input ./temp-schema --output ../../python/jupytergis_core/jupytergis_core/schema/interfaces --output-model-type pydantic_v2.BaseModel --input-file-type jsonschema --set-default-enum-member && rm -rf ./temp-schema
scripts.build:prod: jlpm run clean && jlpm build:schema && jlpm run build:lib
